title: Does Hecarim deserve buffs??
body:
Hey guys,

I'm not saying he's weak and really needs them but...Is it just me or does Hecarim need "some" buffs?

Yes, he received a higher heal cap (or damage, I can’t remember which one) on his Spirit of Dread, but is that really enough?
Yes I know his Q is spammable from 4 seconds to 2 (and I’m pretty sure the 2 seconds are still effected by CDR?????) but like, his Spirit of Dread and Devastating Charge have such high cooldowns in most of the game…
Would he be too strong if his cooldowns on his W & E were buffed?
Also why does his Q have to deal reduces damage to minions and monsters…he’s a jungler…his spammable Q doesn’t even deal that much damage or scale that well anyway…..

Also his passive which grants him invulnerability to unit collision but the AD gained from his bonus movement speed is only useful when you have HomeGuard and you’re losing…Unless you waste a Summoner Spell by taking Teleport using top lane Hecarim which…I should try??

How well does top lane Hecarim work??


Also should Skarner run on Ghost or Flash better (assuming Skarner is in the jungle already with Smite as a Summoner Spell)?

replies.body:
Dude hecarim is insanely strong right now after the nerfs... His cool downs are meant to be that long, as when he was released, his w cd was low enough to make him essentially unkillable, so riot had to nerf it pretty hard. The 30 extra heal cap is absolutely insane now as lane hecarim can regain health at a %%%%%%edly fast speed, and if ever his q didn't do reduced damage to minions and monsters, he would be easily the fastest clearing champion in the whole game.
Also for your question about top hecarim, the buffs recently given has now rendered him an extremely powerful top laner, and so far I have had a 100% lane win rate in 5 games, two of which was against riven. His passive is not for only homeguard, but also allows thing such as youmuu's and righteous glory to be great picks on him, while movement speed items (pd, shiv, tri force etc) also give him a slight extra damage boost, and when paired with champions like zilean he is absolutely devastating.
With the Skarner question, Flash is always better. You don't need Ghost when you have W and Flash helps you surprise R people.
